description: This file defines the NoteSorting class providing comparator and sorting utilities for Note collections, specifically prioritizing pinned notes, then by updatedAt date, then by title.

classes.name: NoteSorting
classes.description: Provides static methods for comparing and sorting Note objects based on specific criteria.

methods.name: pinnedThenUpdatedDescThenTitle
methods.description: Comparator that sorts Notes giving priority to pinned status, then by updatedAt in descending order, then by title ascending.

methods.name: sortInPlace
methods.description: Sorts a list of Notes in place using the pinnedThenUpdatedDescThenTitle comparator.
